span.style: font-size: 12pt; z-index: 251659264; position: absolute; left: 393px; top: -21px; width: 109px; height: 49px; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

p.style: text-align: justify;

br.span: We are pleased to announce that a contract for Activities Director has been offered to Dan Hutsell. Mr. Hutsell is looking forward to leading Blair Community Schools tradition of being Nebraska’s top performing high school in fine arts, activities, and athletics!
Dan Hutsell is currently the Vocal Music Instructor and Director of Choral Activities at Blair High School. He has worked at Blair Community Schools as Vocal Music instructor since 2005.

p.style: margin: 0in 0in 0.0001pt; text-align: left;

span.span:
NEW BLAIR HIGH SCHOOL PRINCIPAL
April 9, 2020
We are pleased to announce that a contract for High School Principal of Blair has been offered to Mrs. Tammy Holcomb. Mrs. Holcomb is looking forward to leading Blair High School's tradition of being Nebraska's top performing high school in academics, fine arts, and activities.
Mrs. Holcomb is currently the High School Principal at Centura Public Schools. She has worked at Centura Public Schools as principal since 2011. Prior to that she had been a High School Principal and Fine Arts Director at David City.

span.br:
Sincerely,
Randall Gilson, Ed.D.
Superintendent of Schools
